document_data.name: Yazid
document_data.mainbody: '''Yazid''' was a skilled [[desert rider]] and member of the [[House of Hanif]] tribe in the [[Haunted Lands]] of [[interior Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p43">
document_data.Description: Though short, Yazid was extremely strong. He inherited his father's sharp senses and features.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p43"/>
document_data.Activities:
Dissatisfied with the state of the tribe, Yazid believe they could build their own [[Zakharan pantheon|enlightened]] city were they not tethered to the court in [[Huzuz]].<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p43"/>

Yazid was sympathetic to the [[House of Hotek]]'s quarrel with [[Hiyal]] and its [[Alurah bint Asrah|Sultana]].<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p44">
document_data.History: Yazid was lost in a sand storm and separated from his tribe for five days. He spent that time among the [[jann]] who divulged wondrous secrets of the future.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p43"/>
document_data.Relationships: Yazid was one of two sons born to Sheikh [[Kaldhun bin Hanif]]. [[Mu'awiya]] was his half-brother.<ref name=LoF:AGtZ-p43"/> Yazid was conceived on the same day as his brother and born later on the same day as his brother.
